S06n628:1: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin svapnadarśī puruṣaḥ svapnasvabhāvanirdeśaṃ ca nirdiśati,

S06n628:32: evameva prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā ||

S06n628:47: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin budbudadarśī puruṣo budbudasvabhāvaṃ ca nirdiśati,

S06n628:53: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvittisvabhāvena pratyupasthitā ||
S06n628:54: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣaḥ kadalyāḥ sāraṃ paryeṣamāṇo nopalabhate,

S06n628:56: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāraṃ na saṃvidyate,
S06n628:58: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣa ākāśanidarśanena vyavahārati,

S06n628:65: na ca kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena vā pariniṣpattyā vā vyavahriyate ||

S06n628:75: na ca so'vabhāso'adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā darśanamupaiti ||

S06n628:384: śīlamapi nopalabhante na manyante prāgeva dauḥśīlyam,
S06n628:387: anadhyavasitāśca kāye jīvite ca prāgeva bāhyeṣu vastuṣu,
S06n628:391: teṣāṃ śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmeṣu dharmeṣu viṣayaśca gatiśca,
S06n628:392: sarvaviṣayā aviṣayā iti ca yeṣāṃ parijānante (parijñānam ?)
S06n628:401: yeṣāṃ śāradvatīputra eṣu dharmeṣu viṣayo gatiśca |
S06n628:402: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra asyāṃ parṣadi samanupaśyāmi ekamapi bodhisattvam,

S06n628:408: niḥsaṃśayā hyete śāradvatīputra eṣvevaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu saṃśayasamatikrāntāḥ ||
S06n628:409: ye'pi te śāradvatīputra paścime kāle paścime samaye imāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śroṣyanti,
S06n628:413: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra parīttakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmeṣu dharmeṣvadhimuktiṃ vadāmi |
S06n628:416: nāpi te śāradvatīputra sattvāḥ parīttakuśalamūlasamanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06n628:417: yeṣāmiyaṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrotrapathamapyāgamiṣyati kimaṅga punarye udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti |
S06n628:420: evaṃ ca te siṃhanādaṃ nadiṣyanti yathāhametarhi siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi astambhitanādaṃ mahāpuruṣanādaṃ svayaṃbhūnādam |
S06n628:421: ye eṣu dharmeṣvatyantaśaḥ śraddhāṃ janayitvā chandaṃ janayiṣyanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06n628:425: ya imān gambhīrān dharmān śrutvā prītiṃ ca vindanti,
S06n628:429: ye gambhīrān dharmān śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti,
S06n628:431: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra tān sattvān mahāsaṃsārasaṃprasthitāniti vadāmi yeṣāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaḥ śravaṇapathamapyāgamiṣyati,
S06n628:433: paṭhiṣyanti adhimokṣyanti udāraṃ ca prītisaumanasyaṃ janayiṣyanti,
S06n628:434: eṣu dharmeṣu chandaṃ janayiṣyanti punaḥ punaḥ śravaṇāyāpi,
S06n628:435: kaḥ punarvādaḥ uddeṣṭuṃ vā svādhyātuṃ vā parebhyo deśayituṃ vā |
S06n628:436: vyākaromyahaṃ śāradvatīputra anavakrāntaniyāmān aniyatān śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhauḥ |
S06n628:437: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra hīnadharmasamanvāgatānāṃ sattvānāmagrato dharmeṣvavakāśaṃ samanupaśyāmi |
S06n628:439: yadbhūyasā ca sattvā hīnādhimuktikā hīnadharmasamanvāgatā akṛtakalyāṇāḥ |
S06n628:441: ye punaste śāradvatīputra udārāḥ sattvā udāradharmādhimuktā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ supariprāptakāryāḥ susaṃnāhasaṃnaddhāḥ suvicitrārthā mahāmārgeṇa saṃprasthitā aviṣameṇa ṛjunā,
S06n628:442: agahanena samena apagatakhāṇukaṇṭakena apagataśvabhraprapātena śucinā apagatakilbiṣeṇa akuṭilena avaṅkena,
S06n628:443: ye lokahitāya saṃprasthitā lokasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya va devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
S06n628:447: teṣāṃ śāradvatīputra tathārūpāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmidaṃ mahādhanam |
S06n628:448: ta eva ca śāradvatīputra mahāsattvā asya dharmaratnasya pratyeṣakāḥ |
S06n628:451: na hi śāradvatīputra akṛtapuṇyānāṃ sattvānāmakṛtakalyāṇānāṃ hīnādhimuktikānāṃ śraddhāvihīnānāmasminnudāre dhane'dhimuktirjāyate |
S06n628:452: etacca me śāradvatīputra saṃdhāya bhāṣitam-dhātuśaḥ satvāḥ saṃsyandanti hīnādhimuktikā hīnādhimuktikaiḥ,
S06n628:454: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat-kiṃgocarā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā ?
S06n628:460: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātuśca na kvacitsaṃdṛśyete,
S06n628:462: evameva śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kvaciddharme saṃdṛśyate,
S06n628:464: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātuśca agrāhyāpariniṣpattito na varṇanimittena saṃkhyāṃ gacchataḥ,
S06n628:465: evameva śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā agrāhyāniṣpattito na kenacidvarṇanimittena saṃkhyāṃ gacchati vā upaiti vā |
S06n628:466: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātuśca na kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattidarśanenopayātau,
S06n628:470: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhātuśca vāyudhātuśca na kasyaciddharmasya pariciṣpattilakṣaṇenopagacchataḥ,
S06n628:471: evameva śāradavtīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattilakṣaṇenopaiti |
S06n628:475: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātudhca na kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattilakṣaṇenopagacchataḥ,
S06n628:486: na ca asaṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na nimittam |
S06n628:491: na hi śāradvatīputra saṅge saṅgo cidyate,
S06n628:516: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāmetadasaṅgalakṣaṇanidarśanaṃ kṛtam |
S06n628:536: yo'bhūtaḥ, tatra bhūtasya pariniṣpattirvā lakṣaṇaṃ vā nāsti |
S06n628:553: n ahi śāradvtīputra gocaranidarśanalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā bhāvyate |
S06n628:554: viṣaya iti śāradvatīputra aviṣaya e ṣa dharmāṇām eṣā yathābhūtatā,
S06n628:564: eṣvevaṃrūpeṣu śāradvatīputra dharmeṣu na bahavaḥ sahāyakāḥ pratilabhyante |
S06n628:567: na hyeṣu śāradvatīputra dharmeṣu kaścidanyaḥ sahāyaḥ,
S06n628:569: teṣāmapi tāvacchāradvatīputra dṛṣṭisaṃpannānāmeṣu dharmeṣu caritānāṃ saṃśayaḥ syāt |
S06n628:570: niḥsaṃśayaḥ śāradvatīputra kāyasākṣī ca bodhisattvaśca pratilabdhakṣāntikaḥ |
S06n628:572: nāyaṃ śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ hastaṃ gamiṣyati |
S06n628:576: kṛtādhikārā buddheṣu bhagavatsu bodhāyāvaropitabuddhabījā buddhayānasamārūḍhā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmāsannasthāyino yoniśaḥ praśnapṛcchakāḥ,
S06n628:585: atha ca śāradvatīputra vyākṛtā eva te mantavyāḥ saṃmukhavyākaraṇena |
S06n628:586: na hi śāradvatīputra aparipakvakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmayaṃ sūtrāntaḥ śrotrapathamapyāgamiṣyati,
S06n628:587: kimaṅga punaryadetaṃ sūtrāntaṃ pratilabheran vā lekhayeyurvā ārādhayeyurvā uddiśeyurvā dhyāyeran vā,
S06n628:591: ya imaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti svādhyāsyanti |
S06n628:592: kiṃcāpi śāradvatīputra uttaptakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hastaṃ gamiṣyati |
S06n628:593: api tu khalu punaḥ śāradvatīputra ārocayāmi te,
S06n628:595: na tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānīyena vā śrāvakayānīyena vā imān dharmān pratilabhya alpotsukena bhavitavyam,
S06n628:596: kusīdena vā middhabahulena vā asaṃprajñena vā anupasthitasmṛtinā vā vikṣiptacittena vā āmiṣagṛddhena vā lolena vā mukhareṇa vā tundena vā pragalbhena vā prākṛtendriyeṇa vā |
S06n628:597: kiṃcāpi śāradvatīputra kuśalamūlāni kṛtāni na visaṃvādayanti |
S06n628:598: api tu khalu imān dharmān labdhvā bodhisattvena bhūyasyā mātrayā apramādaśca vīryaṃ ca utsāhaśca chandaśca akausīdyaṃ ca saṃvṛtendriyatā ca amukharatā cāsevitavyā,
S06n628:602: yadbodhisattvo vā śrāvakayāniko vā evaṃrūpān dharmān śrutvā pramādamāpadyeta,
S06n628:609: nāpi tena ime evaṃrūpā dharmāḥ śrutā bhaveyuḥ |
S06n628:612: na hi śāradvatīputra vipratipannena ayaṃ dharmaḥ śruto bhavati |
S06n628:617: kṣāntisaṃpannasya śāradvatīputra pudgalasya pratipattisthitasya na bhūyo'pāyagamanaṃ bhavati,
S06n628:622: yaḥ śāradvatīputra eṣu dharmeṣu pariniṣpannaḥ śikṣito labdhakṣāntirna bhūyasā apāyagamanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kuryāt |
S06n628:623: na cāsya bhūyaḥ kausīdyaṃ vā hīnabhāgīyaṃ vā bhavet |
S06n628:627: parijñāto hi śāradvatīputra tena bhavati saṃkleśaśca vyavadānaṃ ca,
S06n628:628: dṛṣṭaṃ ca tena yathābhūtaṃ bhavati-sarvadharmā viparyāsasamutthitā abhūtā iti |
S06n628:629: sa evaṃ samyagdarśī kṣāntisaṃpanno bhavati sūrato'mandavān (?)
S06n628:631: devā api śāradvatīputra tathārūpebhyaḥ spṛhayanti prāgeva manuṣyāḥ |
S06n628:632: devānāmapi te tathārūpāḥ sattvāḥ spṛhaṇīyā bhavanti prāgeva manuṣyāṇām |
S06n628:633: devānāmapi te satkārārhā bhavanti prāgeva manuṣyāṇām |
S06n628:634: devairapi te rakṣaṇīyā bhavanti prāgeva manuṣyaiḥ |
